name: RockyRoll
description:
RockyRoll is a platformer game where you play a ball that needs to get to the end of this difficult parkour.

Beware of the falling platforms and the wind... checkpoints won't always save you.

Please be aware that you'll need to configure you keyboards options via wibdows if you do not own a azerty keyboard. sorry !

I am marking this game as "released" but I'd like to add some things... like the ball actually rolling and a pause menu so you don't have **to alt+F4 to quit the game**... I'll get to it someday. We have also been informed that the game is hard in an unfair way at some points ... and we agree.

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 49, more info in the in-game credits.
